name: willow
description: Willow is a self-hosted journaling and well-being tracker designed to help users log moods, thoughts, and reflections. It emphasizes privacy, elegant design, and simple insights presented through a calming, distraction-free web interface.
features: Daily journaling: Record thoughts, moods, and reflections in a private digital journal.
Mood tracking: Log emotional states with customizable mood indicators and track patterns over time.
Reflection prompts: Get inspired with optional writing prompts to encourage deeper self-reflection.
Calendar view: Browse past entries by date with a visual calendar interface.
Search functionality: Find specific entries or topics quickly with full-text search across all journal entries.
Privacy focused: Keep personal thoughts secure on your own server without third-party access.
Markdown support: Format entries with markdown for rich text, lists, and structured content.
Tags and categories: Organize entries with custom tags for easy filtering and retrieval.
Export options: Backup journal entries by exporting to PDF or plain text formats.
Minimalist design: Focus on writing with a clean, distraction-free interface that promotes mindfulness.
Mobile responsive: Journal from any device with a responsive design optimized for phones and tablets.
Data visualization: View mood trends and journaling patterns with simple charts and statistics.
